snippet.title: ATMOSPHERIC TYPING HORROR - DEAD LETTER DEPT. Official Trailer
snippet.description:
DEAD LETTER DEPT. is a cursed data-entry job simulator. You type up and transcribe the lost mail and letters that have nowhere else to go. But as the days carry on oddities in the mail start to emerge, and cracks begin to appear.

AVAILABLE NOW ON STEAM:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1627350/Dead_Letter_Dept/?utm_source=YouTubeFTrailer1

Follow Development At:
https://mailchi.mp/6532684c5741/deadletterdept

#horrorgaming #paranormal #gaming #games #gametrailers
